data.text: @DrJinRussell hey Dr Jin, great article thanks. Reading the news can you please filter it through the medical channels that CoVID is through schools and many will not be recorded -) RAT tests are not proving accurate til day 3 and MyCovid profiles have not been created for kids - thanks x

@DrJinRussell Great article but also tragic we keep repeating mistakes without learning. 80% people in high income countries are vax cf 13% in low income countries. Amazing how rapidly the world dev a COVID vax when ‘we’ were all at risk. Not so for HIV… We are not safe til everyone is safe.
@DrJinRussell It’s good but genuinely grim. Endemicity equals when virus is out of sight and out of mind for the global north.
